remarks: A two-dimensional subspace of partial vector space A is closed, or equivalently, the isomorphism of a join of two atoms is a subset of the subspace sum of the isomorphisms of each atom (and thus they are equal, as shown later for the full vector space H).  (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2014.)
